attributes.action: To put the canary Islands back on the travel corridor
attributes.additional_details:
To put the canary Islands back on the travel corridor due to the fact that there infection rate for the whole pandemic is not far off what the UK figures are on a daily basis not to mention the death rate is around the same , personally I'd feel safer there than at home...
this is more of a political move due to brexit and the fact the E.U have threatened to stop us travelling to the E.U from January 1st
